item.title: Tailwind Tips & Tricks
item.description: The following tutorial will get you up and running with Tailwind CSS, empowering you to build a beautiful, responsive, and animated websites quickly. We will build a side navigation menu inspired by Discord. Setup Install the Tailwind VS Code extension Install the Tailwind VS Code extension. Use a JS Framework Feel free to use the JS framework of your choice. This tutorial uses Create React App. Discord-Inspired Icon Navbar Make the App a Flexible Container Create a flexbox row by simply adding the flex utility to the parent element.
